Course Description: THIS COURSE PROVIDES AN INTRODUCTORY STUDY OF THE FUNDAMENTAL PRINCIPLES OF RECORDING, SUMMARIZING AND REPORTING THE FINANCIAL ACTIVITIES OF PROPRIETORSHIPS. ADVISEMENT NOTE: STUDENTS ACHIEVING LESS THAN A GRADE OF "C" MAY EXPERIENCE ACADEMIC DIFFICULTY IN ACG2011, PRINCIPLES OF ACCOUNTING II. A GRADE OF LESS THAN "C" IS NOT TRANSFERABLE TO UPPER DIVISION.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
